name: Her Icy Catheter Then
description:
"Her icy catheter then" is an anagram of the title of a well-known book by an author who dreaded being plagiarized above all other evils.  I choose to plagiarize that author by anagrammatizing the novel paragraph by paragraph or line by line; this game is a small example of that.  It might get bigger.

If you haven't downloaded Quest, go to http://play2.textadventures.co.uk/Play.aspx?id=kuxeq37kjuqoipa_vuehvg to play online.
